application

类 AlertBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.AlertBox

  • public class AlertBox
extends java.lang.Object
    This class define a AlertBox used for giving error message to users.
    作者:
    OuyangYicheng

      • Alert

        public void Alert(java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String message)
        This method generate a AlertBox used for giving error message to users.
        参数:
        title - - The title of the AlertBox.
        message - - The message of the AlertBox.
